channel.title: Make it so an NPC CANT ATTACK?
channel.description: Please help, I need to make it so one of my NPC's can not attack you when you click attack on it. I've already tried the Return False Method used with Slayer. But it still attacks me after saying you cannot attack that NPC!

item.title: Make it so an NPC CANT ATTACK?
item.dc:creator: @kingtren kingtren
item.description:
@kingtren wrote:

Change its attack mode in npc.java

Read full topic
item.source: Make it so an NPC CANT ATTACK?
